entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low zero except minus 4 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low zero except minus 4 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023
